item.title: Mississippi woman kills escaped monkey fearing for her children's safety
item.description: A homeowner in Mississippi has shot and killed one of the monkeys that escaped after a truck accident last week

item.title: SNAP benefits cut off during shutdown, driving long lines at food pantries
item.description: Long lines have formed at food pantries across the U.S. as federal food benefits were cut off due to the government shutdown

item.title: 2 California prison officers hurt in alleged attack by inmate
item.description: The suspect was being escorted from his cell to allow staff to conduct a search.

item.title: Trump says China's Xi told him he won't move on Taiwan during Republican's term
item.description: Trump says Chinese President Xi Jinping has given him assurances.

item.title: Government shutdown threatens to delay home heating aid for millions of low-income families
item.description: Millions of low-income families may face delays in receiving home heating aid due to the ongoing federal government shutdown
